returns._0: success Whether the edge was added

returns.result: The append result with generated ID

params.beforeTimestamp: Remove records created before this timestamp

params.flow: The flow identifier to filter by (empty string returns all)

returns.result: The query result containing matching records

addEdge(bytes32,bytes32,string).notice: addEdge - links two records via a sync relationship

append(bytes).notice: append - stores an action execution log record

get(bytes32).notice: Retrieve a single log record by ID

purge(uint256).notice: purge - removes records older than a given timestamp

query(string).notice: query - retrieves records matching a flow filter

recordCount().notice: Get the total count of records
